title: Verify Backup Email
emailHelpText: Please click the button below and we will send you a link to your primary email that you can use to verify your new backup email.
confirmationHelpText: Good! Now click the button below to finish the verification.
emailSubmitted: Almost done! Please check your primary email for a verification link.
verified: Your backup email is verified! You can continue using Skole.
loginText: Please look for a link from your primary email that you can use to verify your backup email. If you don't have a link, you may log in and request a new link.
